thread.section_title: Carid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Carid | www.carid.com | 3 of 30
thread.title: Greg

author: Greg
title: Greg
text:
Yea I ordered a Rack and pinion because they had the best price.
Then within two hours decided I did not need it.(On a Saturday) So I called every thing sounded good cancellation was awaiting approval.
They said could take as long as 48 hours, so I waited. Inquired about the cancellation to be told it had shipped.
Received email with UPS tracking check tracking information UPS scanned packed at 1:30 PM Monday. Carid had over 30 hours to cancel the order and failed to do so, to make it worse they will not refund original shipping cost of $22.89, were happy to wave return handling of $9.00 +.
So I am out $22.89 for something that they clearly FAILED to accomplish.
I am waiting another 24- 48 hours to process the return then assuming return shipping label reach me via email and once item is returned I should be receive a refund.
After having to call to get RMA which was delayed at supplier, and item was returned they refunded full amount as stated.
